Ingredients:
6 Chicken breasts, cooked and diced (sub: canned chicken)
6 Eggs, hard boiled then diced
1 Apples, diced (Fuji is a good one, red is good for color)
1 cup Grapes, halved or quartered
1/2 c Pecans, chopped
1 cup Celery, half-moons (optional)

Dressing:
2 c Miracle Whip or Mayonnaise
1 c Orange Marmalade
½ c Sweet Pickle Relish

Directions:
1. Dice all ingredients and toss.

2. Mix dressing in a separate bowl.

3. Gradually add dressing to other ingredients and mix well. Add more or
less dressing as desired.
